name: FunnyQT
body: # FunnyQT FunnyQT is a model querying and transformation library designed as an API and embedded DSL in Clojure. It supports TGraph and EMF models. Current build status: [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/jgralab/funnyqt.png)](http://travis-ci.org/jgralab/funnyqt) ## Documentation The FunnyQT API docs are [here](http://userpages.uni-koblenz.de/~horn/funnyqt-docs/). ## IRC Channel Join us on the official [JGraLab IRC Channel](irc://irc.freenode.net/#jgralab) (channel `#jgralab` on `irc.freenode.net`). If you don't have or don't want to install an IRC client, you can also [chat directly in your browser](http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=jgralab). ## License Copyright (C) 2011-2013 Tassilo Horn & The JGraLab Team Distributed under the [General Public License, Version 3](http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
